message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to both of us. Considering its worth to you, I propose a purchase price of $1,100,000. This offer reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring you receive a fair deal. I believe this price aligns well with the product's value to you, while also allowing me to achieve a satisfactory return on investment. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
